website_summaries.verdict: This flip chart has a built-in cardboard easel to allow it to  stand up on a table.
pros: Can be used in any location
Pages can be pulled off and stuck to the walls
cons: The sheet size on this flip chart is only 20 inches by 23 inches, which is smaller than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher, I use a lot of anchor chart paper. This nice, because I can prop it up when needed, but also, it is smaller than most anchor chart paper, so I can use more for classroom activities. You have plenty of paper and the markers don't leak through. It also sticks to the wall well, without needing extra pins to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Pavit Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Great for school projects or studying
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, and so does my cat who keeps attacking me when I use it lol
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. Or the staples used in manufacturing were substandard. What a mess. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Peer200x

customer_reviews.title: Ideal board for brainstorming
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized board to write on. Sturdy and sticky. I use it to brainstorm ideas on my own and often add and move around small Post-it notes and they adhere nicely to the paper too. Have also used it in a small group setting--even at a restaurant in a booth with other writers. Works slick. One person writes our brainstorming and plotting ideas on the board. Each writer takes their "page" home when the story has been plotted. They can then re-adhere it to a wall or wherever once home. No problems with permanent marker fading through to another page either. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Saffrin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our game night as Pictionary boards. Worked great! The pages rip off nicely after if you wanted to keep them, and the pages have sticky note style glue at the top if you only want to use one sheet at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Luna92

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It’s exactly as described, it rips off easily, and sticks well. The easel was easy to assemble. I use sharpie bullet markers to write on them, and they do not bleed. I didn’t even realize it came with so many for the price. I was pleasantly surprised. I have nothing bad to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sonyae Will

customer_reviews.title: This is now my go to mobile whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size so it is easy to carry (and has little carry cut out handle as well), it sets up on tables and stuff so you can use it with a lot of people, the sticky part works super well, even when I have moved the sheets all around or the wall is textured, the paper stays up with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Paper is fine, adhesive is strong... but the “table top” feature is a joke... won’t stay together, can not use it without setting it against something stable, like a wall...so I tore it off and simply hung the entire pad on the wall... will NOT buy again
customer_reviews.author: Summer Allan Wilson LCSW

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. The paper is a good size and sticks well. I bought it to make anchor charts and use with my students during distance learning. I’ve also used these in the classroom during small group. Love how the paper easily sticks to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Chart paper
customer_reviews.text: A must for my classroom! Works great only thing is markers take a bit to dry on the pads. Almost as if there is a shiny coating on the paper. I’ve smudged my pictures or writing many times. But just allowing it to dry or work carefully helps.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Hood

customer_reviews.title: Greta for school
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a standard on my teacher list every year. Countless uses for it at school, some I don’t even expect like covering windows. Perfect poster size and sticks on real well.
customer_reviews.author: Mozartmama

customer_reviews.title: Super handy teaching tool!
customer_reviews.text: I tutor some home school kids twice a week and I love that I can easily refer back to weeks prior to review. I am also able to post the weeks work and stick it on the wall and they know exactly what to do. This has been a truly helpful teaching tool!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt made correctly
customer_reviews.text: The top part of the paper is supposed to be stapled to the cardboard but only 1 of the staples is actually on the paper, the rest missed it. So the paper doesnt stay up on the easel. We had to fix it and since these arent cheap, its disappointing
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Do you ever purchase something and think, now why didn't I think of that? This is perfect for trainers on the go. You never know what type of flip chart will be available. With this little beauty in your trunk, you never have to worry. It sits on a table, or you can tear the sheets and stick them to the wall, or place it on a flip chart stand. The paper is protected by the carrying case as well. No more ruined flip chart paper. My only complaint is that the paper is smaller than the standard size.
customer_reviews.author: S and K Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive and portable flip charts
customer_reviews.text: These are great inexpensive boards that I have used to display all over (portable!). They do OK with markers with some bleed through so use with care. Other than that I dig em!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was very useful during this distance learning. My students were able to follow along since it was a good size pad. Have the same on in the classroom so knew what I was getting would be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lupe b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for really important subjects you can’t memorize
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product that came in on time no damage. The price for this is really good you can’t beat this somewhere else. I’m more of a visual person so having this really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for visual displays
customer_reviews.text: I frequently use the 3M Post it large easle pads while at work. They work fabulously and adhere well to almost any wall (even some of the "fabric" or "fake" walls in the offices!) However, I picked this one up for a group meeting at my house, and it was great. It folds so I was able to stand it on my kitchen island, and as we used pages, I peeled them and stuck them to my sliding glass doors so we could still read them! Worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: Smaller, but great for team areas
customer_reviews.text: Watch out, it's smaller than the standard easel pads. But same great post-it super sticky quality, and nice tear function. The stand works really nice for a desk. We use it all the time for our team activities, unless we're in a conf room with the larger easel pads!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a bachelorette party - played adult pictionary. I was so much fun and we hung all our rounds on the walls the whole stay. Stayed on the walls for 3 days and still sticky when we took them down,
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Counterfit (seriously)
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the package arrived damaged, it's not even the actual 3m sticky notes. this is a collection of barely adhesive post its, crudely stapled to a damaged 3m easel.
customer_reviews.author: Vibranze

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This pad served its purpose for my meeting. However, I was very upset in how the product arrived. It does not look clean and crisp like it does in the picture. The outer cardboard that holds it up was bent and ripped. The sides of the pages were frayed and dirty. I needed this for a meeting so I didn't have time to try and get a second one. My recommendation, go buy it from the store. This comes to you looking like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were not so expensive for the number of pages
customer_reviews.text: I use post-it flip charts constantly directly on the wall as separate pages. I love the weight of the paper and convenience of them sticking to wall without damaging the paint. I wish they were a little wider and buyers were given more pages per pad.
customer_reviews.author: R I Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 2020-2021 Teaching Tools
customer_reviews.text: This is so helpful for remote learning. I can tote this between home and school with no trouble because it folds.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these easel paper poster. They worked great for my presentations and stuck to walls without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Tattered and Torn
customer_reviews.text: Product came torn and separated. I was able to fix it and staple it back together at the top but I would not have bought something torn up like this at the store and I do not feel that I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what you'd expect from post-it. The table top feature of these is wonderful. We used this for a homemade Pictionary and it was perfect. Would definitely order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for schooling
customer_reviews.text: My son is remote learning and I am able to use this board for all kinds of examples
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Utilization!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!!! We use this to write our to do list for homeschool on everyday and it works Great! Nice and visible!
customer_reviews.author: nosduh

customer_reviews.title: Buying this again!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be buying this over and over. I use it with my clients and I wish I'd found it sooner! It's light weight, folds open and closed really easily and the giant post it note (the sticky part at the top) is really helpful during a brainstorm session to immediately hang up what's been discussed already.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Sallak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great. The tabletop option is really great. It is strong and doesn't bend when writing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney S

customer_reviews.title: and liked the visibility of them so much we ordered some ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these all the time at work for team meetings, and liked the visibility of them so much we ordered some for his home office too. He's studying a lot of programs online takes notes on these, and then lines his clear glass desk with the sheets of notes. He jokes that my to-do list might get done faster if I stuck one of these up in our kitchen. The adhesive is strong enough to individual sheets on the wall for about a week, the paper is decent quality, nothing too special, pretty lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: knares13

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item as an addition to my virtual teaching collection.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: easel damage
customer_reviews.text: item was wrinkled and staples came apart before any use just received it today's
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for table top
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the measurements. This is smaller than the standard attach to an easel pad. I bought this on a whim for a meeting that didn't have an easel so it's great for that but you need to keep in mind it is smaller than the standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Tabletop
customer_reviews.text: Purchased by my wife to assist in online staff projects and student instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Neil K.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that I could use this as a table top easel, or attach it to the easel I purchased. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super Versatile & Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a school teacher; I teach 21 Pre-K students every day. I have a small message board (dry erase) and a black board easel, so this tablet of sticky note paper with built-in easel has been WONDERFUL!!! I love it!!! I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Singer74

customer_reviews.title: Quality paper and stickiness for portable presentations
customer_reviews.text: A great product for presentations or teaching b/c you can use it tabletop and then peel off sheets to stick around the room as you teach/present. The post it sticky allows you to reposition the paper a couple times before it loses stickiness. Pages will remain on wall for weeks (I've never had to leave them longer but they've never fallen off on me before I had to take them down!)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kieras

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This chart has worked very well for me thus far. Next time I will order a larger one from the same company. As I teach classes, I have had easy use of this one. Easy carry-handles. Easy fold-up to flat for carrying. Great product for my usage!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha-Dorcas

customer_reviews.title: superb quality
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! I am very happy with the product. Consider ordering in multiple quantities if you don't wanna feel bad about all the cardboard used for packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Atakan

customer_reviews.title: Item ordered before...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this item before and have given it top rating. However, this time it gets a 2 star rating. This is because the tablet fell apart. The staples were loose on the upper top binding and did not hold the pad of paper securely. Can be a little inconvenient when teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Pawz4U

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Portable Easel Pad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my class book club. It's compact enough to travel from class-to-class. I love the smart easel design!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit to my bulletin boards in my classroom. I can move the paper two times before the adhesion starts wearing off! But love the size!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: We use these constantly at work. They are great for group meetings and work sessions. They are thick enough that sharpies don't bleed through them, and stick nicely to walls and windows without leaving a residue or pulling off paint. The real secret is to use these with regular sized post-its for maximum innovation
customer_reviews.author: Jake M

customer_reviews.title: Love Chart Paper
customer_reviews.text: Chart paper is a great way to make notes or post announcements in class. I also use it at home for my little one to know what she needs to do in the morning and at night (routine).
customer_reviews.author: LAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I've never bought the regular size ones again!
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many of these I order for training, I've never been able to keep the extras. In addition to being able to post the paper on the wall, I'm able to easily have breakout sessions in a room without people having to be able to jockey for position near the regular size pads. Makes training more engaging and effective when people can work together comfortably without moving their chairs (especially in smaller rooms).
customer_reviews.author: Skimbale

customer_reviews.title: Portable whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy access to my very own portable white board
customer_reviews.author: Telesa Echols

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: sticks to walls with no problem I just wish if it could come with a variety of colors
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Song

customer_reviews.title: Head of the class.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets tear nicely and are sticky even with reuse/movement. I didn’t expect to use or like the stand but it came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these for her “classroom at home”. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for meetings and classrooms
customer_reviews.text: Economic way to present material when you don't have a whiteboard; or to prepare ahead and then present without wasting time writing in front of a group.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: As a grad student who works best with visual cues, this is a helpful tool. I didn't want to invest in the whole easel-paper shebang, and had limited space. This fits well on my kitchen table or even perched on the dog's kennel in the living room. The only draw-back I noticed is that it is flimsier than those easel pads, but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sassafrass66

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these to use at work and also at my house. I do presentations for my job and this is portable and you can tear the sheets off and stick to any surface like a big Post-It note. At home we put the kid's chores on there and hang on the wall. The kids love racing to get their chores done and see who can do it the quickest and mark their names off. The sheet stick well to different surfaces without hurting them.
customer_reviews.author: Seebs

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pictionary
customer_reviews.text: We use these for family Pictionary games. It's funny to look back at all the pictures when the game is over.
customer_reviews.author: M. Q. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid19. I starter homeschool my kidos. So I purchased this Easlpad. I was not happy. Because doesn’t have lines. And it’s poor quality. I won’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lahsen oummad

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Took these on and off the cement wall about 20 times and they still stuck!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and the papers are a good size and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and the papers are a good size and stick on walls very well. However, my easel pad came damages with one side not attached to the easel. I had to clip it with a clasp to use it. I would have returned it for a new one but the box that it came in so was so large that it would have been more of a hassle to return than just use it damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Elina A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chart Paper
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived in great shape! As a college student preparing to be a teacher, this product is great for my practicums when I do small group lessons! And it is fairly affordable. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them when we went virtual. Awesome in every way. This is great for your kids to create because they stick to the wall and the kids can create.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well for meetings
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our strategic planning. It worked out very well, and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This paper was smaller than expected and the adhesive makes the pages behind it not hold ink very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and Product
customer_reviews.text: Delivery and Product was just as it was stated! Thanks for the prompt delivery and accurate description! Satisfied Customer from Maryland
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just a note pad
customer_reviews.text: Used it for couple's game night, but the adhesive could be better
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1-2 uses only
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard is not as strong as it need to be. We needed it for several presentations and it is not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrelia Merritt

customer_reviews.title: portable and fun
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use and to store. I didn't want to hassle with a wooden standing easel and these are a good alternative. The paper is thick enough to stand full saturation with tempra paints, no bleed through to underlying paper. I saved the cardboard easel when all the paper was used up and using heavy duty paper clasps - clip paper from regular pads purchased locally onto the cardboard easel and that works fine to. My intention is just for fun. So if you want this for your kids or yourself to play with I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Shabby construction
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I was disappointed in a product sold through Amazon. As soon as I took it out of the package, the paper attached to the easel fell off! I have added tape and binder clips to it to make it work. Ordered one last year and had no problems. D. Howard
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not many pages
customer_reviews.text: Not many pages, stands up fine, over priced for the number of pages
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was probably one of my most convenient purchase. This is super amazing for all the anchor charts I make for my students!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great! I use it for anchor charts around the the classroom. Just the perfect size. Wish the school would provide it without me paying out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and exactly what I needed. I have it hanging on my wall for use and storage but I can take it with me and set it up when I am on the go. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKay74

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Paper
customer_reviews.text: The Table Top Easel makes it easy to use. It was just what I needed for my math classroom.
customer_reviews.author: skaterjas

customer_reviews.title: Giant post it notes basically
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good presentation board for planning an event. The A-Frame design an large size worked quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for out Pictionary Game!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a group game of Pictionary at a convention and it was perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Folder sheets at delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The product came with papers all folded up! Cannot use it for the professional reason we needed it for!
customer_reviews.author: maverixcharm

customer_reviews.title: Love these but teachers shouldn’t have to buy supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for anchor charts for my class. I don’t understand why they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use the sticky tablet paper to create anchor charts for my class. The design makes it easy to write on.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to the wall very well
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Sheets stick very well. I've had a few stuck to a wall for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pulled all the pages off and stuck to the wall. Zero bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in tact, works just like described-slightly pricy, but all in all A Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Lona C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and set up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. More portable than our stand & post-its, but a smaller writing space and less pages (get more than one if your presenting all day.) Ideal for close spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Liz O

customer_reviews.title: deceptive screenshots, buyers beware, no dry erase pad
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this item, if you are looking for a dry erase pad. Item screenshots are deceptive, it implied that the pad comes with dry-erase pad, which it does not, I am looking for one with the dry-erase pad, please remove your deceptive screenshots.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: The easel stand makes it convenient to draw on. I will get another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: iluv2teach

customer_reviews.title: The perfect answer for "conference room flip chart" needs
customer_reviews.text: I wish all products were this easy. Thick enough paper to prevent bleed through, folds into an easel and the pages are like giant Post It notes and stick to the wall. They answer every "conference room flip chart" need, when easels are not available.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Skies

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport and sheets stick to the wall well. Just what I needed for the focus group I was facilitating.
customer_reviews.author: ML in NJ

customer_reviews.title: 3 flip charts short
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a very important training class. I didn't open the box until the actual meeting, when I opened the box and it looked great. Then we started using the flip charts. Wrote on the first page, tore off the page and there was only 1 sheet of paper on the entire flip chart. So needless to say we were not able to complete our training as planned because we were 3 flip charts short
customer_reviews.author: Lori Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Cool beans
customer_reviews.text: Sweet! Works like an easel but no stand needed. Just set it on the table and go to town. Folds open into a triangle shape and is pretty stable.
customer_reviews.author: ReconMarine1969

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool
customer_reviews.text: Great for making charts for nursing school to hang on my walls for studying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessandthecity

customer_reviews.title: Only ones I will use!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! They are a perfect size for anchor charts without taking up a ton of wall space. They are sticky enough to be moved around a few times and think enough to use markers without it showing through.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but a great tool
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but great tool for my at home discussion group. I posted one or two pages weekly onto Monterrey drag(texture) walls with flat paint. They've been up for 2 months and only once did one come loose. I have even repositioned a few of them after a week without incident. The one that came loose hasn't fallen again either, so maybe I just didn't get it on there firmly enough the first time. I used flip chart markers and didn't have any problems with bleed through. I'm very pleased, I will purchase again for the next group!
customer_reviews.author: A mother of four

customer_reviews.title: Description and reviews reference Dry Erase Panel - NOT INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as description included and reviews referenced, "20 in x 23 in, 20 Sheets/Pad, 1 Dry Erase Panel, 1 Pad." But item received was not the version with dry erase pad. Which I needed so total waste of time. Amazon, correct your product description. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love the giant post-its, don't love the giant price.
customer_reviews.text: These smaller than the usual giant-sized easel pads are perfect for use in my classroom. Buying it on my own dime, however, is a bit painful.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Handy travel companion
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for presentations on the go. Easy to carry. Anything that works like a giant post-it note is great for presentations...no hassle with tape or gasp, leaving tape marks. The table top feature is good if your presentation is already prepared. Not the best for brainstorming types of writing. You need to remove the paper and post on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cathy

customer_reviews.title: This is only the paper NO dry erase.
customer_reviews.text: This is standard flip chart paper. It is sticky to post to wall. My major complaint is that it is implied that this version has a dry a race board in the back, and the questions and answers say that it does but it does NOT. This is only the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Demers

customer_reviews.title: Handy tabletop easel
customer_reviews.text: Great to have when you're not sure what the meeting room will have. Some small conference rooms don't have a board to write on or other technology. I've used it for small meetings in break rooms, small office spaces, etc. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: East Bay Jen

customer_reviews.title: Useful in my classroom
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my classroom. I wish it came in the larger size in white instead of yellow.
customer_reviews.author: T. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: It tends to sag under its own weight. It doesn't fall over or anything but it just doesn't look very good. Also sometimes when you try to tear off a sheet, the perforations don't let it go and it starts to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: What a thoughtful design! this saved us so much ...
customer_reviews.text: What a thoughtful design! this saved us so much money - at first, we thought we will have to spend money on buying an easel that would cost us about $100. Thank God for this!
customer_reviews.author: Y.S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a giant post it board!
customer_reviews.text: Like a massive post-it note! Stores well, sticks to walls easy enough, and doesn't bleed with heavy pens. Perfecto!
customer_reviews.author: Zach McQueary

customer_reviews.title: damaged item
customer_reviews.text: This item was damaged. The bottom was bent and wrinkled deeply. Was very dissatisfied. Because I have an indented and almost torn bottom right 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Felicia cameron

product_meta.title: Post-it Super Sticky Tabletop Easel Pad, 20 x 23 Inches, 20 Sheets/Pad, 1 Pad (563R), Portable White Premium Self Stick Flip Chart Paper, Built-in Easel Stand
product_meta.description: Size:1 PadIt’s an amazing feeling when your team just clicks—everyone feels a shared drive toward success. But, how do you ignite that feeling on every team? Capture the spark at your next meeting with Post it Super Sticky Easel Pads. Adhesive backed sheets stick and restack to hold up to 2X longer* to most wall surfaces, unlike flip chart paper. The paper resists marker bleed through so you can capture input by writing directly on the sheet. Use with Post it Super Sticky Notes to organize ideas. Download the free Post it App to instantly capture and save your work so you can share notes with the team without recaps or delays.
feature_bullets: STICKS SECURELY AND HOLDS UP TO 2X LONGER - Easel paper can be repositioned without surface damage. No tape or tacks needed unlike standard flip chart paper. Keep agenda and ideas where everyone can see.
INK BLEED-THROUGH RESISTANT PAPER - Large white premium self-stick flip chart paper that resists marker bleed-through to keep great ideas on the page, not on what's under the page.

IDEAL FOR BRAINSTORMING AND MANAGING PROJECTS - Perfect for training or teaching sessions, brainstorming sessions, planning sessions, project management and agile processes, meetings and presentations.
LARGE WHITE PREMIUM PAPER - 20 in. x 23 in., 20 Sheets/Pad, 1 Pad/Pack
NO EASEL STAND NEEDED - Includes a carry handle and built-in easel stand for portability.
USE WITH POST-IT SUPER STICKY NOTES - The large, stickable paper to capture thoughts with Post-it Super Sticky Notes. Give ideas a place to grow.
EXPLORE OPTIONS - Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads are also available in larger standard sizes with Grid Lines, Lines, Bright Yellow, White and White Recycled Paper.
EXPLORE SIZES - Post-it Super Sticky Easel Pads also available in more sizes - Mini Easel Pad and Wall Pad.
USA - Made in the USA with globally sourced materials.

DOWNLOAD THE FREE POST-IT APP - Stop spending hours transcribing notes after a brainstorm; download the free Post-it App. Now you can instantly capture and save your work so you can share notes with your team without recaps or delays.
